original_text: I will give you the right words to speak at that time. I will help you to be wise. The people who are against you will not be able to argue with you. They will just be quiet.
korean_text: 내가 너희의 모든 대적이 능히 대항하거나 변박할 수 없는 구변과 지혜를 너희에게 주리라

sentences.original_text: I will give you the right words to speak
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 말할 올바른 말을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: I will help you to be wise
The people who are against you
will not be able to argue with you
